original_text: And he came to the ram that had two horns, which I had seen standing before the river, and ran unto him in the fury of his power.
korean_text: 그것이 두 뿔 가진 숫양 곧 내가 본 바 강 가에 섰던 양에게로 나아가되 분노한 힘으로 그것에게로 달려가더니

sentences.original_text: And he came to the ram
which I had seen standing before the river
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 강가에 서 있는 것을 보았던 바로 그것이라

sentences.original_text: in the fury of his power
